statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT description FROM financial_transactions WHERE description LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_id
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE description LIKE '%withdrawal%' LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, category FROM financial_transactions WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT report_id, total_transactions, total_amount FROM reports WHERE report_date = '2021-09-30';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount DESC
SELECT account_id, category, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND category = 'Income'
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT transaction_id, category, account_id FROM financial_transactions WHERE category LIKE '%Expenses%'
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, description, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT report_date, net_profit, total_income, total_expense FROM accounting_reports ORDER BY net_profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_reports WHERE tax_report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT tax_due, taxable_income FROM tax_reports ORDER BY tax_due ASC, taxable_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM accounting_reports WHERE total_income > total_expense AND net_profit > 5000;
SELECT tax_report_id, taxable_income, tax_due FROM tax_reports WHERE tax_due IS NOT NULL ORDER BY taxable_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale';
SELECT report_id, total_amount, created_by FROM accounting_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT tax_report_id, tax_type, total_tax FROM tax_reports WHERE submitted_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, transaction_type, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type, total_amount, created_by FROM accounting_reports WHERE total_amount < 5000 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT tax_report_id, tax_report_date, tax_type, total_tax, submitted_by FROM tax_reports WHERE tax_type = 'Income Tax' ORDER BY tax_report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT report_type, content FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT account_id, account_name FROM accounts JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT tax_id, AVG(tax_rate) AS average_tax_rate FROM taxes GROUP BY tax_date ORDER BY average_tax_rate DESC LIMIT 3;
